content:
TERM: Cluster Centroid Compression

DEFINITION:
Clusters similar LLM outputs and compresses only centroids to Zepto, reducing redundancy while retaining coverage.

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Clusters similar LLM outputs and compresses the centroid to Zepto to reduce redundancy while retaining coverage.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Compressed 14 similar API retry tips into one centroid representation.

CATEGORY: AnalyticalTechnique

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: DimensionalityReduction; used_by: KnowledgeextractoR, ZeptopatterncompressoR; related_to: EmergentdomaindetectoR
